text: Luv is a 1967 American romantic black comedy movie directed by Clive Donner and was based on the play of the same name by Murray Schisgal. It stars Jack Lemmon, Peter Falk, Elaine May, Nina Wayne, Eddie Mayehoff, Paul Hartman, Harrison Ford and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1967 romantic comedy movies Category:1960s black comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Clive Donner Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Suicide in movies Category:Movies set in New York (state)
title: Luv (movie)
